崩.definition: to collapse; to fall into ruins; death of king or emperor; demise

崩倒.definition: to collapse; to crash down; to fall down in a heap

崩坍.definition: landslide; collapse (of mountain side); talus slide

崩塌.definition: talus slide; to crumble (of scree slope); to collapse; landslide

崩壞.definition: crash; breakdown (of social values etc); burst; to crumble; to collapse

崩決.definition: to burst (of dam); to be breached; to collapse

崩潰.definition: to collapse; to crumble; to fall apart

崩症.definition: metrorrhagia (vaginal bleeding outside the expected menstrual period)

崩落.definition: talus slide; to crumble (of scree slope); to collapse; landslide

崩裂.definition: to rupture; to burst open; to break up

崩陷.definition: to fall in; to cave in

崩龍族.definition: the Benglong (Penglung) ethnic group of Yunnan
